thought: To craft the polished_andesite_stairs, I first need to craft the polished_andesite. The polished_andesite requires placing 2 andesites on top of each other in the crafting grid, therefore I will start by moving one of the andesites from slot 40 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 40 to slot 1 with quantity 1
